hot_lead_expected.reason: Motivated seller with urgent 60-day timeline, qualified $425K budget, decision maker, specific property details provided (1234 Oak Street, 3bed/2bath), high engagement, open to cash offer
hot_lead_expected.expected_sms: Hi John Doe! Thanks for your interest in selling your property. Based on our conversation, I'd like to schedule a walkthrough. I've sent you a calendar invite - does tomorrow at 2pm work? Reply YES to confirm. - Sarah

warm_lead_expected.reason: Interested but not urgent, 6-month timeline, needs spousal approval (not sole decision maker), vague pricing ($500K range), wants more information, moderate engagement
actions_taken: SMS sent with comp analysis mention
warm_lead_expected.expected_sms: Hi Mike Thompson! Great talking to you. I'm sending you our Seller's Guide via email with comp analysis for your area. Let me know if you have questions! - Sarah

cold_lead_expected.reason: Not motivated, filled form out of curiosity only, no timeline, vague property details, low engagement, reluctant tone
